Besides taking care of her home, Narcisa has been making a living selling clothes for 20 years. She only works on market days and without a fixed schedule. She is also a professional stylist who has studied and has been providing services in a salon on the weekends for the last five years. 

This new loan will be used to invest in the purchase of clothing in order to have a greater variety of merchandise and that way, gain more customers. 

Her goal is to have her own beauty salon. 

The small photo is of a group member that could not be present at the time when the group photo was taken.

loans.use: to buy clothing

loans.name: Maria

texts.pt:
Divorciada e mãe de 8 filhos dos quais 3 frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com os seus filhos e sustenta sua mãe que vive com ela.	
Trabalha como operaria agrícola numa empresa privada de produção de bananas. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (ferro, cimento, aros, janelas, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa.
No futuro espera terminar a sua casa e melhorar as condições de vida da sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é pagar o empréstimo sem dificuldades.
texts.en:
She's divorced and has eight children, three of whom attend school. She lives with her children in a house she owns and also supports her mother who lives with her.
She works as an agricultural laborer for a private company that produces bananas. With the current loan she intends to purchase construction supplies (iron, cement, window frames, etc.) in order to continue building her house.
In the future she hopes to finish building her home and to improve her family's living conditions. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is repaying the loan without difficulties.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (iron, cement, window frames, etc.) in order to continue building her house.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es:
Nilda tiene 32 años, su pareja es Javier, con quien tiene tres hijos. Esta familia cuenta con su casa propia ubicada en una zona agrícola de la selva central.
Lleva 10 años en la agricultura, el mismo tiempo que lleva a lado de su pareja. Por eso, los dos se hacen responsables del cultivo de sus productos: arvejas, lechugas y papas. “Rentable son las arvejas y las papas, pero en temporadas, por eso siembro más estos productos”, afirma entusiasta. También cuentan con algo de ganado (ovejas) que aprovechan en pastar mientras están en el campo. Lleva una buena relación con su pareja, quien la apoya en todas las actividades agrícolas; mientras Javier se encuentra en el campo, Nilda lleva los alimentos para él y para los peones, así es su manera de trabajo. Por eso, en cada cosecha obtiene los resultados de su esfuerzo: buenas ventas. Ahora iniciará otra siembra de papas y arvejas.

Este es su crédito número 5 con MFP y además pertenece al banco comunal “Lindo amanecer de Cumutay”, donde es una tesorera eficiente. Se compromete, nuevamente, en cumplir con los pagos y con las reuniones de su grupo.
Nilda invertirá estos 3000 nuevos soles en la compra de cuatro bolsas de semillas de arvejas (con 2200 soles); lo que sobra será para adquirir fertilizantes.
texts.en:
Nilda is 32. She has three children with her partner, Javier. The family have their own house, which was built in an agricultural area in Peru’s Selva Central region.

Nilda has worked in agriculture for 10 years – the same amount of time she has been with her partner. They share the responsibility for looking after their land, where they grow peas, lettuce and potatoes. “The peas and the potatoes are profitable, in season, so I sow these products more”, she says enthusiastically. She has a good relationship with Javier, who helps her with all the agricultural activities. While he works in the fields, Nilda has her own tasks – bringing out meals for him and the labourers. In this way the couple reap the benefits of their hard work at each harvest: their sales are good. At the moment they are about to sow more potatoes and peas.

This will be Nilda’s fifth loan with MFP and she is also a member of the community bank “Lindo amanecer de Cumutay”, where she is an efficient treasurer. She recently renewed her pledge to make the repayments and attend the community bank’s meetings. 

Nilda will invest the loan of 3000 PEN by buying four bags of pea seeds for 2200 PEN and using what is left over to purchase fertilisers.

loans.use: to buy four bags of pea seeds and fertiliser.

loans.name: Celeste

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 2 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É negociante e dona do negocio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, feijão, refresco, cervejas, e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.
No futuro espera construir um estabelecimento próprio para expor os seus produtos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o pagamento devido do empréstimo.
texts.en:
She's married and has two children who attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She's a trader who runs her own business selling essential goods. With this loan she intends to purchase goods (beans, rice, refreshments, beer, etc.) in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future she hopes to build her own store for displaying her products. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is repaying the loan acoording to the schedule.

loans.use: to purchase goods for selling (beans, rice, refreshments, beer, etc).

loans.name: Lida

texts.pt:
Viúva e mãe de 2 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Tem um negócio próprio de fabrico e venda de roupas. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar tecidos para fabricar roupas, panos, para fazer uniformes e panos de mesa. 
No futuro deseja ampliar o seu negócio empregando mais pessoas e adquirir uma maquina de estampar os tecidos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o elevado custo de vida e as doenças.
texts.en:
She's a widow and has two children who attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She runs her own business making and selling clothes. With the current loan she intends to purchase fabric for making garments, dishcloths, uniforms and tablecloths.
In the future she wishes to expand her business by employing more people and to purchase a textile printing machine. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is the high cost of living and the illnesses.

loans.use: to purchase fabric for making garments, dishcloths, uniforms and tablecloths.

loans.name: Enhtur

texts.en:
Mr. Enhtur is a 51-year-old man who lives with his wife and 5 children in a ger (a Mongolian nomadic tent) in the Zavhan province of Mongolia. His wife Shagja is 52 years old. She works for a private company, earning a salary of 150,000 MNT. His oldest son Enhbaatar is 28 years old and married. His two daughters Dawaasuren and Nyamsuren, aged 21 and 18, are college students. His younger sons Enhbat and Enhbayar, aged 9 and 5, are secondary school students.  

Enhtur started his business in 2009. He and his brother have been making only walls for gers. In 2011 he started to make furniture for houses and apartments.

Enhtur is a hardworking and quiet-natured man. He needs 1,200,000 MNT to purchase equipment and raw materials for his business.

loans.use: to purchase equipment and raw materials for his business

loans.name: Manuela Ramos Group

texts.es: La Sra. Asunta   es soltera,  tiene 51 años de edad,  actualmente es socia  en la alcancía comunal “Manuela Ramos”  grupo  conformado por 5 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio. Asunta se dedica a vender jugos en un puesto propio en el mercado, Asunta nos cuenta que se hizo de un capital para comprar este puesto en el mercado, trabajo muy duro hoy en día cuenta con clientes fidelizados y su negocio a ido creciendo   Asunta se considera una mujer independiente, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación a logrado mejores ingresos tiene una casa propia y sus padres cuentan con una mejor calidad de vida. Asunta  ha solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar insumos (frutas, leche, azúcar, etc). Asunta cumplirá metas con mucho trabajo y agradece a Edaprospo y kiva por el préstamo otorgado.
texts.en:
Asunta is 51 years old and single. Currently, she is a partner in the "Manuela Ramos" community bank which is made up of five partners who make their livings through various commerical activities. Asunta sells juice in her personal stand at the market. 

Asunta says that she used some capital to purchase the stand at the market. She works very hard and now she has a faithful customer base and her business has grown. Asunta considers herself an independent woman. Thanks to her hard work and dedication she has made a better income, has been able to purchase her own home and her parents have a better quality of life. 

Asunta is asking for a new loan to buy supplies (fruit, milk, sugar, etc.). Asunta will accomplish her goals with hard work and she is grateful to Edaprospo and Kiva for offering a loan.

loans.use: to buy supplies (fruit, milk, and sugar, etc).

loans.name: Rufino

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É técnico veterinário e tem um negócio próprio de criação e venda de frangos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar pintos, vitaminas, ração, vacinas e outros para aumentar a sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja desenvolver mais a sua actividade de criador de frangos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o pagamento devido do empréstimo.
texts.en:
He's married and has two children, all of whom attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and doesn't support anyone else.
He's an animal health technician and has his own business of raising and selling chickens. With this loan he intends to purchase chicks, vitamins, feed, vaccines, etc. in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future he wishes to further develop his poultry business. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is repaying the loan according to the schedule.

loans.use: to purchase chicks, vitamins, feed, vaccines, etc. in order to stock up with merchandise.

loans.name: Carlos Paolo

texts.es: Carlos Paolo, tiene 22 años de edad, es soltero. Él es estudiante de la carrera de Contabilidad en una universidad muy conocida. Su mayor inspiración  son sus ansias de progresar como persona y profesional y lograr todas sus metas fijadas. Considera que su ingreso a la Universidad fue el primer paso al desafío mas grande de su vida que es ser un profesional destacado. Lucho mucho por mantenerse dentro y entre los primeros puestos, todo gracias al apoyo que recibió de su familia. Con el préstamo recibido iniciará sus trámites para lograr su titulo profesional, él cual es un requisito que le permitirá crecer y poder postular a un mejor puesto en la empresa donde trabaja desempeñándose como contador interno.
texts.en:
Carlos Paolo is 22 years old and single. He is an accounting student in a very well-known university. His greatest inspiration is his longing to grow as a person and a professional and to succeed in achieving all of his goals. He considers his entry into university as the first step toward the most significant goal of his life, which is to become a distinguished professional. He has worked hard to maintain his position among the top-ranked students, all thanks to the support that he received from his family. 

With the loan he received, Carlos Paolo will begin the procedures required for becoming a professional. Fulfilling these requirements will permit him to grow and to be able to advance to a better position in the company where he works, holding a position as an internal accountant.

loans.use: to pay for the procedures required to become an accountant

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
This is Cristina, 25, a resident of Cavite, Philippines. Her husband is Ray Christian, a collector. She, together with her husband, manages their own household while operating the business.

Cristina operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store that retails groceries, toiletries and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a PHP 5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her store is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She also sells charcoal. She earns a minimum of PHP 600 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 10,000 loan. She will be using the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory and for the maintenance of her sewing machine. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 
Cristina hopes her business would grow and expand through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Basan

texts.en: Basan is 54 years old and lives with her husband and 5 children in a small house in the Uvs province, Mongolia. Her husband, Bat-Ulzii, has worked on a farming field for 4 years. Basan's older son is a college student and four of her children are secondary school students. She started her household product retailing business on rental counters in 2008. She wants to expand her business and is planning to increase the amount of products she sells to customers from Ulaanbaatar capital city. She is a good natured and hardworking person. She is requesting a loan for 1,500,000 MNT to purchase more goods to sell.

loans.use: to purchase more goods to sell.

loans.name: Ihtiram

texts.en:
Ihtiram is a conservative woman so her son took her place in the photo.

Ihtiram's oldest son has just passed his high school exam and is now about to enter University. She wants to take this loan so she can pay for her first son’s university fees so she, like any mother, can see her son succeed.

loans.use: pay university fees for her son

loans.name: Merlita

texts.en:
This is Merlita. She previously accessed a 8,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan that she used to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her child and in their personal, household and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another 10,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add in her inventory. The more items displayed at the store, the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and educational expenses of her child. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Merlita dreams to expand her store and help her children through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week, and this is where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Amalia

texts.en:
This is Amalia. She previously accessed an 8,000 PHP loan that she used to pay for raw materials needed in her tailoring business. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in their personal, household and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another 10,000 PHP loan that will be used in buying raw materials such as fabric, needles and the like. Her profits from business will definitely help her to cover her daily needs and the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Amalia hopes her business grows and she dreams of being able to give her children a good future through all of her hard work. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God they study.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for raw materials needed in her tailoring business.

loans.name: Gilda

texts.pt:
Viúva e mãe de 5 filhos todos maiores de idade vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustentam mais ninguém. 	
É negociante e dona do próprio negócio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, blocos, ferro, pedra, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa, mobilar e remodelar o seu estabelecimento para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o pagamento devido do empréstimo para poder ter a oportunidade de pedir outro.
texts.en:
Gilda is a widow and the mother of 5 children, all over 18. She lives in her own house with her family and doesn’t support anyone else.

She’s a trader and owns her own business selling essential products. With this loan she plans to buy construction material (cement, blocks, iron, stone and others) to continue building her house.

In future she wishes to finish her house, furnish it and re-fit her commercial establishment and to this end she commits to duly paying off her loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is to pay off her loan so that she has the opportunity to request another one.

loans.use: buy construction materials (cement, blocks, iron, stone and others)

loans.name: Satou's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de quatre au sein du banc villageois créer en juillet 2008, est composé de femmes très dynamiques et fondatrice du dit banc villageois. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce et l’agriculture.

Madame Satou (assise la seule assise) est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est veuve, âgée de 62 ans et est mère de 07 enfants dont 05 garçons et 02 filles. Son activité consiste à l’achat de moutons qu’elle engraisse pour la revente deux ou trois mois après. Elle vend aussi du miel et de l’arachide suivant la saison.

Avec ce prêt , elle compte acheter  07 moutons  à  40 000F Cfa l'unité pour les revendre à 55 000F Cfa ou plus après embouche de deux à trois mois. Et avec le reste l’argent, elle va acheter de l’arachide et du miel pour la revente.

Les bénéfices lui serviront de prendre bien soin de ses enfants sur le plan sanitaire et alimentaire.
texts.en:
This group of four dynamic women forms part of a banc villageois that they created in July 2008. Their main business is small-scale commerce and farming. Satou (the woman seated in the photo) is the featured borrower of this group. She is a widow, aged 62, and is a mother to seven children, five boys and two girls. Her business consists of buying sheep that she fattens for resale for two or three months. She also sells honey and peanuts following the season. 

With this loan, Satou expects to buy seven sheep at 40,000 francs CFA a piece, and resell them for 55,000 CFA or more after she fattens them up for two or three months. With the rest of the money, she is going to buy peanuts and honey to sell. The profits will serve to take care of her children's health and food needs.

loans.use: to buy sheep to resell after a few months of fattening

loans.name: Awa's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est composé de femmes travailleuses, qui ont adhéré dés la naissance du banc villageois le 02 Juillet  2008. Elles vivent toutes dans le même quartier et partage de fortes valeurs de solidarités et d’entre aide.

Madame Awa (assise à droite dans la photo) est l’emprunteuse vedette. Agée de 46 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 03 filles. Elle fait le maraichage patate, piment… et la culture de l’arachide durant la saison des pluies. Ces activités elle les pratique depuis sa tendre jeunesse.

Avec ce prêt elle compte acheter 50 kilogrammes d’arachide non décortiqué à 17 500F Cfa frais de décorticage   2 000 F Cfa par sac de 50 kilos, 06 sacs d’engrais à 17 500F Cfa le sac, de payer les frais de labourage à    10 000 par hectare et 15 000F Cfa de frais de désherbage à  trois reprise.
 la vente des produits est prévue à la récolte en décembre et janvier.
 les bénéfices lui permettront de répondre aux dépenses quotidiennes et le suivi sanitaire de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This group is composed of working women who joined the 'banc villageois' when it was created on July 2, 2008. They all live in the same district and share strong values of solidarity and mutual aid.

Ms. Awa (seated at the right in the photo) is the featured borrower. She is 46 years old, married, and the mother of three girls. She operates a market garden growing sweet potatoes, chili peppers…, and she farms peanuts during the rainy season. She has been doing this work since she was very young.  

With this loan, she intends to pay for 50 kg of unshelled peanuts at 17,400 francs, shelling fees at 2,000 francs per 50-kg sack, 6 sacks of fertilizer at 17,500 francs each, plowing costs for 10,000 hectares, and weeding costs at 15,000 francs for three runs. 

She plans to sell the produce at harvest time in December and January. The profits will enable her to cover day-to-day expenses and health care follow-up for her children.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and other farm inputs to prepare her field

loans.name: Angel Leonardo

texts.es: El Sr. Leonardo tiene 32 años, tiene un hijo de la edad de  17, años, se dedica a la Agricultura sembrando variedad de vegetales como también papa y yuca y maíz en su parcela que se encuentra en la comunidad de Abapo,  este préstamo es el su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  el Sr. Leonardo va a utilizar  este préstamo para la siembra de maíz y lo que implica el preparado de la tierra, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es para obtener recursos  para la siembra y poder subsistir, el Sr. Leonardo enfrenta retos en su negocio que son las inclemencias del clima que en muchas ocasiones arruinan los sembradíos,  y utilizara los beneficios Para mejorara la calidad de vida del cliente y de su familia ya que el corre con todos los gastos del hogar, es una persona  responsable y trabajador se siente agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Leonardo, 32, has a 17-year-old son.  He works in agriculture planting a variety of vegetables as well as potatoes, manioc and corn on his parcel located in the community of Abapo.  This loan is his first sequence in the institution.  Leonardo will use this loan for his corn crop which implies preparing the soil.  His reason for requesting the loan is to have the resources needed to plant and to be able to subsist.  The business challenge Leonardo faces is climate changes that often ruin crops.  He will use profits to improve his and his family’s quality of life since it’s his responsibility to cover all household expenses.  He is a responsible, hardworking man who is grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 6 filhos dos quais apenas 2 frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com os seus filhos e sustenta a sua mãe e mais 2 sobrinhos que vivem com ela. 	
É negociante e dono do próprio negócio de venda de produtos alimentares. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (amendoim, arroz, caldo, óleo, e outros), para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja ampliar o seu negócio construindo um estabelecimento comercial para expor a sua mercadoria. Compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é fazer crescer o seu negócio e obter mais rendimento.
texts.en: Julieta is the single mother of six children, two of whom go to school.  She lives in her own home with her children and also supports her mother and two nephews who live with her.  She owns her own business selling food products.  She will use this loan to buy products (peanuts, rice, soup, oil, etc.) to increase her quantity of merchandise.  In the future, she hopes to expand her business and to build a commercial establishment to display her merchandise.  She promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenge is making her business grow and obtaining more income.

loans.use: to buy and sell peanuts, rice, soup, oil, etc.)

loans.name: Paulo

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 4 filhos dos quais 3 frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Trabalha como operador de máquinas numa empresa de produção de bananas e tem um negócio próprio de criação e venda de frangos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar pintos, ração, vitaminas, e outros, para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja mobilar a sua casa para melhor confortar a sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é aumentar o nível do seu negócio e obter mais rendimento.
texts.en: Paulo is married and is the father of four children, three of whom go to school.  He lives in his own home with his family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.  He works as an equipment operator in a company that produces bananas.  He also has his own business raising and selling chickens.  With this loan, he will buy chicks, feed, vitamins, etc., to increase his quantity of merchandise.  In the future, he hopes to furnish his home so his family can be more comfortable.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.  His challenge is growing his business and obtaining more income.

loans.use: to buy chicks, feed, vitamins, etc., to increase his quantity of merchandise.

loans.name: Enisio

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 4 filhos todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É militar e quadro do Ministério da Defesa. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (chapas de zinco, barrotes, porta, cimento, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa para melhor confortar a sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o pagamento devido do empréstimo.
texts.en:
Enisio is married and the father of four children, all of whom attend school. He lives in his own house with his family and does not provide for anyone else. He is a military man and a staff member at the Ministry of Defense.

With this loan he intends to buy construction materials (zinc sheets, wooden beams, a door, cement and others) to continue the construction of his house. In the future he wishes to complete his home so his family can live with more comfort. For that, he is committing to repaying the loan, in order to be able to request more from Hluvuku. The challenge is to repay the loan.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (zinc sheets, wood beams, a door, cement and others) to continue the construction of his house.

loans.name: Jose

texts.pt:
Solteiro e pai de 1 filho ainda menor. Vive na casa dos seus pais com o seu filho e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É electricista e quadro da Electricidade de Moçambique. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, areia, ferro, pedra, e outros) para dar inicio a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa, aumentar o nível de escolarização e se reconciliar com a mãe do seu filho, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos de investimento e o custo elevado do material de construção.
texts.en:
Jose is single and the father of one son, who is still underage. He lives with his son in his parents' house and does not provide for anyone else. He is an electrician and a staff member at Electricidade de Moçambique (Mozambican electricity provider).

With this loan he intends to buy construction materials (cement, sand, iron, stone and others) to begin the construction of his house.

In the future he wishes to complete his house, improve his education and be reconciled with the mother of his son. For this, he is committing to duly repaying the loan in order to request more from Hluvuku.

The challenge is the lack of funds to invest and the high cost of construction materials.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, sand, iron, stone and others) to begin the construction of his house.

loans.name: Isaac

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos dos quais 2 frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta a sua mãe enviando dinheiro para ajudar nas despesas alimentares. 	
Trabalha como ferreiro há bastante tempo. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (areia, cimento, ferro, pedra, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa, mobilar e casar se oficialmente e para tal compromete -se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a insuficiência de fundos para realizar todos os seus projectos e as doenças.
texts.en: Isaac is married and the father of five children, two of whom are still in school. He lives with his family in a home they own and also supports his mother, sending money to help her pay for food. He has been working as metalworker for a long time. He will use this loan to buy construction materials (sand, cement, iron, stone, etc.) to continue building his house. In the future he hopes to finish building his house and get married. He is committed to paying off this loan so he can apply for further loans from Hluvuku. His greatest challenges are illness and his limited funds to complete all his projects.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (sand, cement, iron, stone, etc.) to continue building his house.

loans.name: Jafete

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 1 filho ainda menor, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Trabalha como balconista num restaurante. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (blocos, cimento, barrotes, chapas de zinco, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e construir um restaurante, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é trabalhar mais e melhorar as suas condições de vida.
texts.en:
Jafete is married and has one son, who is still quite young. He lives with his family in a home they own and is not financially responsible for anyone else.  He works as an assistant at a restaurant. He plans to use this loan to buy construction materials (cinder blocks, cement, beams, sheet metal, etc.) to continue building his house. 
In the future he hopes to finish his house and build a restaurant. He is committed to paying off this loan so he can apply for further loans from Hluvuku. 
He will work hard to improve the living situation for himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cinder blocks, cement, beams, sheet metal, etc.) to continue building his house.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 5 filhos que não frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É negociante e dona do próprio negócio de venda de produtos alimentares. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (areia, cimento, pedra, portas, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra das dependências de para aluguer. 
No futuro deseja terminar as dependências e construir um murro de vedação na sua casa, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
 O desafio é a dificuldade financeira e o elevado custo de vida.
texts.en: Lucia is married and is the mother of five children who go to school.  She lives in her own home with her family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.  She owns her own business selling food products.  She will use this loan to buy construction materials (sand, cement, stone, doors, etc.) to continue work on outbuildings to rent out.  In the future, she hopes to finish the outbuildings and to build a security wall around her home.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvku.  Her challenges are financial difficulties and the elevated cost of living.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (sand, cement, stone, doors, etc.) to continue work on outbuildings to rent out.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta a sua irmã que vive com ele. 	
É negociante e dono do próprio negócio de venda de castanha de caju. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar grande quantidade de castanha de caju para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja desenvolver mais o seu negócio e apostar nos estudos dos filhos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é trabalhar mais para obter mais rendimento para sustentar os estudos dos filhos.
texts.en:
Jaime is married and the father of three school-aged children. He lives with his family in a home they own and also supports his sister, who lives with them. 
He has a business selling cashew nuts. He will use this loan to buy a large quantity of cashews to increase his inventory. 
In the future he hopes to invest more in his business and pay for his children's schooling, and he is committed to paying off this loan so he can apply for further loans from Hluvuku. 
He will work hard to earn greater profts and support his children's studies.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of cashews to increase his inventory.

loans.name: Evelina

texts.pt:
Viúva e mãe de 6 filhos todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É negociante e dono do próprio negócio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, farinha, óleo, feijão, e outros), para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja melhorar as condições da sua casa e apostar nos estudos dos seus filhos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos suficientes para realizar todos os seus projectos e garantir a formação dos seus filhos.
texts.en:
Evelina is a widow and a mother of six children, all of whom attend school. She lives in her own house with her family and does not provide for anyone else.

She is a trader and owns her own business, selling basic goods. With this loans she intends to buy products (rice, flour, oil, beans and others) to increase her quantity of merchandise.

In the future she wishes to improve the conditions of her home and invest in the education of her children. For this, she commits to duly repay the loan, in order to request more from Hluvuku.The challenge is the lack of sufficient funds to carry out all her projects and to guarantee the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy products (rice, flour, oil, beans and others) for resale.

loans.name: Leonor

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 3 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com os seus filhos e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Trabalha como operária agrícola numa empresa de produção de bananas. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material eléctrico para a instalação eléctrica na sua residência. 
No futuro deseja aumentar mais um quarto na sua casa e mobilar, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o pagamento devido do empréstimo e o conforto da sua família.
texts.en:
Leonor is married and the mother of three school-aged children. She lives with her family in a home they own and is not financially responsible for anyone else. 
She works for a banana company. She will use this loan to buy electrical supplies to install electricity in her home. 
In the future she hopes to add another room to her house and furnish it. She is committed to paying off this loan so that she can request further loans from Hluvuku. 
She will work hard to pay off this loan and provide her family with a comfortable life.

loans.use: to buy electrical supplies to install electricity in her home.

loans.name: Lisete

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 3 filhos dos quais apenas 1 frequenta a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 3 enteados e 1 irmã que vivem com ela. 	
Trabalha como técnica administrativa no governo distrital de Boane. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, blocos, pedra, ferro, e outros) para dar continuidade a construção do murro da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar o murro da sua casa e a sua formação superior, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é concluir o ensino superior e crescer profissionalmente.
texts.en:
Lisete is married and has three children, only one of whom is still in school. She lives in her own home with her family and also supports three stepchildren and one sister, who live with them. 
She is an administrative worker in the Boane district government. She plans to use this loan to buy construction materials (cement, cinder blocks, stone, iron, etc.) to continue building a wall around her house. 
In the future she hopes to finish the wall around her house and complete her studies. She is committed to paying off this loan so she can apply for further loans from Hluvuku. 
She will work hard to finish her higher education and grow professionally.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, cinder blocks, stone, iron, etc.) to continue building a wall around her house.

loans.name: Esperanca

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 5 filhos todos maiores, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É negociante e dono do próprio negócio de venda de frangos empeçados. Com este empréstimo pretende aumentar o stock para satisfazer a demanda.
 No futuro deseja ampliar o seu negócio diversificando os seus produtos e construir uma casa para aluguer, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conquistar mais clientes e fazer crescer o seu negócio para obter mais rendimento.
texts.en:
Esperança is married and the mother of five adult children. She lives in her own house with her family and does not provide for anyone else.

She is a trader and owns her own business selling prepared chicken. With this loan she intends to increase her stock to satisfy demand.

In the future she hopes to expand her business by diversifying her products and to build a house to rent. For this, she is committing to duly repay the loan in order to request more from Hvuluku.

The challenge is to gain more clients and grow her business to make more income.

loans.use: to increase her stock to satisfy customer demand.

loans.name: Las Rosas De Pabatoc Group

texts.es:
La señora Petrona esta casada, tiene 24 años de edad, cursó los 5 años de educacion primaria, tiene 2 hijos ninguno de los cuales estudia, se dedica a la confección y venta de pants y sudaderos, inicio este negocio produciendo muy poco y vendiendo ambulante mente, y hasta l momento lleva 5 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien la apoya en el negocio que tiene.

Organiza un grupo para solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizaran para la compra de telas de diferente colores e hilos, espera en el futuro tener varios locales de venta y mas colaboradores en su centro de producciones. Las demás integrantes se dedica a la producción de prendas y al comercio.
texts.en:
Petrona is married, and is 24 years old. She completed 5 years of primary school, and has 2 children, neither of whom are in school. She makes a living tailoring and selling pants and sweatshirts. When she started this business, she produced very little and sold her goods door to door. As of now she has 5 years of experience, and has the support of her husband who helps her in the business.

She has organized a group to request a loan that will be used to buy different colors of fabric and thread. She hopes in the future to have many locations to sell her goods and more partners in her production location. 

The remaining members of the group earn a living making clothes and in trade.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread to tailor pants

loans.name: Maria

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 2 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 1 sobrinho que vive com ela. 	
É negociante e dona do próprio negócio de venda produtos de primeira necessidade. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (amendoim, óleo, feijão, peixe, frangos, e outros) para aumentar e diversificar a sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja construir quartos para aluguer e construir um salão de cabeleireiro, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
 O desafio é investir mais no negócio para conquistar mais clientes obter mais rendimento.
texts.en: Maria is married and is the mother of two children who go to school.  She lives in her own home with her family and also supports one nephew that lives with her.  She owns her own business selling basic goods.  She will use this loan to buy products (peanuts, oil, beans, fish, chickens, etc.) to expand and diversify her merchandise.  In the future, she hopes to build rooms to rent out and to construct a beauty salon.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenge is investing more in her business to attract more customers and to obtain more income.

loans.use: to buy and sell products (peanuts, oil, beans, fish, chicken, etc.)

loans.name: Saga Group

texts.en:
This group is called Saga, which consists of four female members who live in Aden, Yemen. Anisa, 34, is married and has three children. She has had a house for seven years and she started building a room for herself and her husband. She would like to renew her house. 
On this occasion, Anisa needs the loan of 80000 YER to buy building materials such as cement and lumber. She is grateful for the loan and commits to making her installment payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as cement and lumber for her building

loans.name: Alice

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 5 filhos todos maiores, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É negociante e dono do próprio negócio de venda de roupa diversa. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar (mantas, lençóis, roupas, e outros), para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja construir um estabelecimento comercial para expor a sua mercadoria, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é fazer crescer o seu negócio e obter mais rendimento.
texts.en: Alice is married and is the mother of five adult children.  She lives in her own home with her family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.  She owns her own business selling various clothing.  She will use this loan to buy merchandise (blankets, bedding, clothing, etc.) to increase her quantity of merchandise.  In the future, she hopes to build a commercial establishment to display her merchandise.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenge is making her business grow and obtaining more income.

loans.use: to buy and sell clothing (blankets, bedding, clothing, etc.)

loans.name: Zacarias

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 8 filhos dos quais apenas 4 ainda frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 2 netas que vivem com ela. 	
É militar e negociante dono do próprio negócio. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (chapas de zinco, barrotes, porta, cimento, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e adquirir um camião para o transporte dos produtos para o seu estabelecimento, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é aumentar o ritmo do seu negócio para aumentar mais o seu rendimento.
texts.en: Zacarias is married and is the father of eight children, four of whom go to school.  He lives in his own home with his family and also supports two granddaughters that live with him.  He is a member of the military and also has his own business.  He will use this loan to buy construction materials (zinc sheets, beams, a door, cement, etc.) to continue work on his home.  In the future, he hopes to finish his home and to acquire a truck to transport his products to his business.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.  His challenge is increasing his work pace so he can increase his income.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (zinc sheets, beams, a door, cement, etc.) to continue work on his home.

loans.name: Domingos

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta a sua mãe e mais 3 irmãos que vivem com ele. 	
Trabalha como operador de máquinas numa empresa de fabrico de mobiliário. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (areia, blocos, cimento, ferro, e outros) para a construção do murro da sua residência. 
No futuro deseja terminar o murro e ampliar a sua residência, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o pagamento devido do empréstimo e o bem – estar da sua família.
texts.en: Domingos is married and is the father of three children who go to school.  He lives in his own home with his family and also supports his mother and three siblings that live with him.  He works as an equipment operator at a furniture manufacturing company.  With this loan, he will buy construction materials (sand, blocks, cement, iron, etc.) to build a wall around his home.  In the future, he hopes to finish the wall and to expand his home.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.  HIs challenges are making his payments on time and the well-being of his family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (sand, blocks, cement, iron, etc.) to build a wall around his home.

loans.name: Ilda

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 6 filhos dos quais apenas 2 frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais uma neta que vive com ela. 	
É negociante e dono do próprio negócio de venda de roupa usada. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar fardos de roupa para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja desenvolver mais o seu negócio e melhorar as suas dependências de aluguer, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos suficientes para realizar todos os seus projectos.
texts.en: Ilda is the single mother of six children, two of whom are in school.  She lives in her own home with her family and also supports her granddaughter who lives with her.  She owns her own business selling used clothing.  She will use this loan to buy bundles of clothing to increase her quantity of merchandise.  In the future, she hopes to expand her business and to improve the outbuildings she rents out.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenge is the lack of sufficient funds to carry out all of her projects.

loans.use: to buy and sell clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and sell products (rice, flour, beans, soft drinks, etc.).

loans.name: Manuel

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 1 filha ainda menor, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais uma sobrinha que vive com ele. 	
Trabalha como motorista numa empresa privada. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (areia, cimento, pedra, portas, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja matricular-se numa formação de mecânica e casar oficialmente, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é trabalhar mais e melhorar as suas condições de vida.
texts.en: Manuel is married and is the father of one daughter who is still very young.  He lives in his own home with his family and also supports a niece who lives with him.  He works as a driver for a private company.  He will use this loan to buy construction materials (sand, cement, stone, doors, etc.) to continue work on his home.  In the future, he hopes to enroll in a mechanic's course and to buy his marriage license.  To do this, he promises to make his loans on time so he can request more from Hluvuku.  HIs challenge is working more and improving his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (sand, cement, stone, doors, etc.) to continue work on his home.

loans.name: Arminda

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 3 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta a sua sogra que vive com ela. 	
É negociante e dono do próprio negócio de venda de material de construção. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (areia, cimento, para o fabrico de blocos, e outros), para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja ter um estaleiro mais amplo para aumentar as suas receitas, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é aumentar mais a produção de blocos para satisfazer os seus clientes.
texts.en: Arminda is married and is the mother of three children who go to school.  She lives in her own home with her family and also supports her mother-in-law, who lives with her.  She owns her own business selling construction materials.  She will use this loan to increase her quantity of merchandise.  In the future, she hopes to have a larger space so she can increase her income.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenge is increasing her production of blocks to satisfy her customers.

loans.use: to buy and sell construction materials (sand, cement to make blocks, etc.).

loans.name: Ecelina

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 3 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Trabalha com torno e fresa há bastante tempo. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (loiça sanitária, porta, aros, azulejos, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e casar oficialmente, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é aumentar o ritmo do seu trabalho para conseguir realizar seus projectos.
texts.en: Ecelina is married and is the mother of three children who go to school.  She lives in her own home with her family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.  She has worked at a mill for quite a long time.  With this loan, she will buy construction matierals (bathroom fixtures, a door, frames, tiles, etc.) to continue work on her home.  In the future, she hopes to finish her home and to buy her marriage license.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenge is increasing her work pace so she can keep carrying out her projects.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (bathroom fixtures, a door, frames, tiles, etc.) to continue work on her home.

loans.name: Sergio

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 1 filho ainda menor, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta a sua mãe e mais 3 irmãos que vivem com ele. 	
É negociante e dono do próprio negócio de venda de produtos diversos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, açúcar, refrescos, cervejas, e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja remodelar e mobilar a sua casa e casar oficialmente, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é trabalhar mais para obter mais rendimento e poder ter mais oportunidades de empréstimos.
texts.en: Sergio is married and is the father of one young son.  He lives in his own home with his family and also supports his mother and three siblings who live with him.  He owns his own business selling various products.  He will use this loan to buy products (rice, sugar, soft drinks, beers, etc.) to increase his quantity of merchandise.  In the future, he hopes to remodel and furnish his home and to buy his marriage license.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more from Hluvuku.  His challenge is working more to obtain more income to have more opportunites for loans.

loans.use: to buy and sell products (rice, sugar, soft drinks, beer, etc.)

loans.name: Anita

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 6 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 2 sobrinhos. 	
É pensionista militar a bastante tempo. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, chapas de zinco, barrotes, ferro, e outros), para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa, mobilar e construir um murro de vedação, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é fazer um negócio para aumentar o seu rendimento.
texts.en: Anita is married and is the mother of six children who go to school.  She lives in her own home with her family and also supports her two nephews.  She has received a pension from the military for some time.  She will use this loan to buy construction materials (cement, zinc sheets, beams, iron, etc.) to continue work on her home.  In the future, she hopes to finish her home, to furnish it, and to build a security wall around it.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenge is starting a business so she can increase her income.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, zinc sheets, beams, iron, etc.) to continue work on her home.

loans.name: Madina Marmiyal Darou S.l Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois Madina Marmiyal est créé le 9 juillet 2011 date de son inauguration; le groupe PC 01 est constitué de 31 femmes qui sont issues du même quartier.

Madame Farmata l'emprunteur vedette est âgée de 26 ans, elle est mariée et n'a pas d'enfant. Elle s'active dans le commerce, elle posséde une mercerie où elle vend également des produits cosmétiques. Elle est assisse à droite sur le banc, habillée en bleu et a levé la main gauche.

Elle se ravitaille à la capitale, Dakar, en parfums, shampooing, crème, fils, boutons, biais, popeline, etc et charge sa boutique à Saint Louis pour la revente.

Son prêt lui servira d'acheter une bonne quantité de produits cosmétiques et d’accessoires de mercerie pour renforcer sa boutique et aussi pour mieux préparer les fêtes religieuses période à laquelle elle pourra se faire beaucoup de revenus. 


Avec les bénéfices attendus elle souhaite épargner afin d'atteindre une autonomie financière et pouvoir voyager pour son commerce.
texts.en:
The "Madina Marmiyal" Banc Villageois was created on July 9 2011, that day being its inauguration day.  This PC 01 group consists of 31 women who come from the same neighborhood.

Farmata, the featured borrower, is 26 years old.  She is married, without any children.  She is actively involved in business and owns a sewing supplies shop where she also sells cosmetics.  She is sitting on the right-hand side, on a bench.  She is dressed in blue and is raising her left hand.

She buys her supplies (perfumes, shampoo, lotions, threads, buttons, ribbons, poplin, etc) in the capital city, Dakar and then stocks up and resells her products in her shop in Saint Louis.

Her loan will be used to buy a large quantity of cosmetic products and sewing supplies in order to boost her shop's inventory and to be ready for the religious holidays, a time of year during which she will be able to make large profits.

With her expected profits, she wishes to save some money.  Those savings will allow her to become financially independent and to travel, for business purposes.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies and cosmetic products for resale.

loans.name: Soukhaly Gouyar Alte Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois Soukaly Gouyar Alte est créé le 28 décembre 2010; le groupe PC 01 est constitué de dix neuf femmes qui habitent le même village, elles sont parentes, amies et voisines.

Madame Awa la responsable est âgée de 31 ans, elle est mariée mère de cinq enfants dont deux garçons; elle s'active dans le petit commerce d'habits et de produits de maquillage depuis très longtemps et a une bonne expérience. Elle est debout sur la photo bien en évidence habillée en robe vert-jaune avec écharpe sur les épaules et a levé la main gauche.


Elle achète des nuisettes, habits enfants, fards à joues et paupières dans les villes et revend dans son village.


Elle compte avec son prêt acheter 50 ensembles pour enfants, 30 nuisettes et une douzaine de fards pour ainsi se faire beaucoup de revenus.


Les bénéfices obtenus lui permettent d'épargner chaque mois, d'aider ses enfants dans leur scolarité et d'appuyer son mari dans la gestion des dépenses familiales.
texts.en:
"Banc Villageois Soukaly Gouyar Alte" was created on December 28, 2010; the group PC 01 is composed of nineteen women who live in the same village. They are related, friends, or neighbors.

Ms. Awa, the group's official, is 31 years old, married, and the mother of five children, including two boys; she has been active in the small-scale commerce of clothing and cosmetic products for a very long time and has good experience. In the photo, she is standing in full view and dressed in a green-yellow dress with a scarf around her shoulders, and her left hand is raised. 

She purchases babydoll nighties, children's clothing, blush, and eye shadow in the cities and resells them in the village.

With this loan, she plans to purchase 50 outfits for children, 30 nighties, and a dozen blush compacts, thus bringing in large revenues. 

The profits obtained will enable her to save money each month, help her children with schooling costs, and support her husband in managing family expenses.

loans.use: to purchase clothing and cosmetics to be sold

loans.name: Aurora

texts.pt:
Viúva e mãe de 3 filhos dos quais apenas 1 frequenta a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustentam mais ninguém. 	
Trabalha como empacotadora numa empresa de produção de bananas. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (chapas de zinco, cimento, barrotes, portas, e outros), para dar continuidade a obra da sua residência. 
No futuro deseja crescer profissionalmente e apoiar os estudos do seu filho, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
 O desafio é a dificuldade financeira e a formação do seu filho.
texts.en: Aurora is a widow and has three children, only one of whom is still in school. She lives in her own home with her family and is not financially responsible for anyone else. She works as a baler for a banana company. She plans to use this loan to buy construction materials (sheet metal, cement, beams, doors, etc.) to continue building her house. In the future she hopes to grow professionally and support her son's education. She is committed to paying off this loan so that she can request further loans from Hluvuku. Her greatest challenges are financial difficulties and her son's education.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (sheet metal, cement, beams, doors, etc.) to continue building her house.

loans.name: Sophie's Group

texts.fr: Madame Salma est une femme mariée âgée de 57 ans et mère de 10 enfants dont 5 garçons et 5 filles.Elle est membre du banc villageois depuis sa création en 2008.Elle partage de bonnes relations sociales et économiques avec ses camarades de groupe.Elle est debout à l’extrême gauche de la photo la main levée habillée en grand boubou blanc.Salma fait du commerce de pagnes, poissons séchés,et divers produits.Avec son nouveau crédit de 200000 elle va acheter des poissons séchés et divers produits qu'elle va revendre au détail au niveau de son quartier.Les bénéfices lui permettent de renforcer ses épargnes de participer aux charges familiales et de régler des besoins personnels.
texts.en:
Ms. Salma is a married woman, 57 years old, and the mother of ten children, five girls and five boys. She has been a member of the 'banc villageois' since its creation in 2008. She shares in good social and economic relationships with her fellow group members. 

In the photo, Ms. Salma is standing at the far left with her hand raised and is dressed in a great white 'boubou'. She does commerce in 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa), dried fish, and a variety of goods. With this new loan of 200,000 francs, she is going to purchase some dried fish and other goods that she is going to sell retail in her district. The profits will enable her to bolster her savings, help with family expenses, and cover personal needs.

loans.use: to purchase a fish and a variety of goods to sell

loans.name: Alice

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 2 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com os seus filhos e sustenta mais uma sobrinha que vive com ela. 	
É negociante e dono do próprio negócio de venda de produtos diversos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (amendoim, arroz, frangos, óleo, e outros), para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja construir um estabelecimento comercial para expor a sua mercadoria, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é fazer crescer o seu negócio e obter mais rendimento.
texts.en: Alice is the single mother of two children who go to school.  She lives in her own home with her children and also supports a niece who lives with her.  She owns her own business selling various products.  She will use this loan to buy products (peanuts, rice, chicken, oil, etc.) to increase her quantity of merchandise.  In the future, she hopes to build a commercial establishment to display her merchandise.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenge is making her business grow so she can obtain more income.

loans.use: to buy and sell products (peanuts, rice, chicken, oil, etc.).

loans.name: And Jàppo Keur Serigne Louga Est Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois And Jappo Keur Serigne Louga Est existe depuis le 27 décembre 2010, le groupe PC 02 est composé de trente sept femmes qui habitent la même ville, sont solidaires et ont pour activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Diama la responsable est âgée de 32 ans; elle est mariée mère de quatre enfants dont une fille. Elle mène un commerce de tissus et capitalise une expérience de 18 mois.Sur la photo elle est debout à droite à l'extrême habillée en rouge jaune avec un châle mauve autour de la tête.


Elle achète ses tissus auprès d'une femme commerçante qui les ramène de Dubaï et revend dans la ville.


Avec son prêt elle envisage d'acheter des tissus pour une valeur de 200000 F en y mettant un apport personnel de 55000 F afin de gagner beaucoup de revenus.

Les bénéfices obtenus lui permettent d'aider son mari dans les dépenses familiales ( habillement,nourriture...)
texts.en:
"Banc Villageois And Jappo Keur Serigne Louga Est" has existed since December 27, 2010. The group PC 02 is composed of 37 women who live in the same city, are together in solidarity, and have small businesses as their main work. 

Ms. Diama, the group's official, is 32 years old; she is married and the mother of four children, including one girl. She has a fabrics business and capitalizes on 18 months of experience. In the photo, she is standing at the far right and dressed in red and yellow with  a mauve shawl around her head. 

She purchases her fabrics from a woman, merchant who brings them back from Dubai to resell them in the city. 

With her loan, she envisions purchasing fabric for 200,000 francs, which including a 55,000 contribution of her own, so as to earn more income. 

The profits obtained will enable her to help her husband with family expenses (clothing, food, …)

loans.use: to purchase cloth to resell

loans.name: Cristina

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 1 filho que frequenta a Escola, vive na casa dos seus pais com o seu filho e sustenta mais 4 irmãos que vivem com eles. 	
É negociante e dona do próprio negócio de venda produtos de primeira necessidade. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, blocos, ferro, pedra, e outros), para remodelar a sua casa de banho. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa de banho e construir um estabelecimento maior que possa expor os seus produtos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
 O desafio é conquistar mais clientes e ser reconhecido no bairro onde vive.
texts.en: Cristina is a single mother with one school-aged son. She lives in her parents' home and also supports four siblings, who live with them. She has a business selling staple goods. She plans to use this loan to buy construction materials (cement, cinder blocks, stone, iron, etc.) to remodel her bathroom. In the future she hopes to finish her bathroom and build a larger space from which to distribute her merchandise. She is committed to paying off this loan so she can apply for further loans from Hluvuku. She will work hard to expand her customer base and be recognized in the neighborhood she lives in.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, cinder blocks, stone, iron, etc.).

loans.name: And Jàppo Keur Serigne Louga Est Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois And Jappo Keur Serigne Louga Est existe depuis le 27 décembre 2010, le groupe PC 01 est composé de vingt cinq femmes qui sont solidaires et sont pour la majeur partie des commerçantes.

Madame Anta Diama la responsable est âgée de 45 ans; elle est mariée mère de six enfants. Elle mène un commerce de chaussures et parfums et a une bonne expérience.Sur la photo elle est debout à droite habillée en boubou rose et a levé la main droite.


Elle se rend à Touba pour s'approvisionner en chaussures tous genres et des parfums pour revendre dans son quartier.


Avec son prêt elle va acheter les chaussures à 2500 F, 3000 F et 5000 F la paire et des parfums pour accroître son offre et se faire aussi beaucoup de revenus.

Les bénéfices obtenus lui permettent d'aider son mari dans les dépenses familiales et d'assurer la prise en charge scolaire des enfants.
texts.en:
"Banc Villageois And Jappo Keur Serigne Louga Est" has existed since December 27, 2010. The group PC 01 is composed of five women who are joined in solidarity and who are merchants for the most part.

Ms. Anta Diama, the group's official, is 45 years old; she is married and the mother of six children. She has a business selling shoes and perfumes and has good experience. In the photo, she is standing at the right with her right hand raised and is dressed in a pink 'boubou'.

She goes to Touba to stock up on shoes of all types and perfumes to resell in her district.

With her loan, she is going to purchase shoes at 2,500 francs and 5,000 francs a pair and some perfumes to increase her offerings and also to bring in large revenues.

The profits obtained will enable her to help her husband with family expenses and to ensure that the children's schooling costs are covered.

loans.use: to purchase shoes and perfumes to resell

loans.name: Maguette's Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois Bokk Jom Sakal est créé le 1er juillet 2011, il est composé de 35 femmes micro-entrepreneurs qui habitent le même village, elles sont parentes, voisines, amies et leur lien commun est le petit commerce. 

La présidente Maguette est âgée de 42 ans, elle est mariée mère de six enfants dont trois filles. Elle s'active dans le petit commerce de produits cosmétiques. Sur la photo elle est debout tout à fait à droite habillée en wax et tenant une pochette dans la main droite. 

Elle se rend à Dakar pour s'approvisionner en(parfum,lait de beauté......) et revend à Sakal. 

Elle compte acheter pour une valeur totale de 150000 F en amenant son apport personnel de 80000F. 


Les bénéfices réalisés lui ont permis de contribuer aux charges familiales( nourriture,scolarité des enfants, dépenses quotidiennes....);de renforcer son commerce et de résoudre ses besoins personnels.
texts.en:
"Banc Villageois Bokk Jom Sakal" was created on July 1, 2011. It comprises 35 women micro-entrepreneurs who live in the same village. They are related, neighbors, or friends, and their common link is having small businesses.

Maguette, the group's president, is 42 years old. She is a married mother of six children, including three girls. She is active in the small-scale commerce of cosmetic products. In the photo, she is standing at the far right, dressed in a 'wax' cloth outfit, and holding a handbag in her right hand.

She goes to Dakar to stock up on (perfume, skin lotion, …) and resells in Sakal.

She intends to purchase goods worth 150,000 francs, which includes personal contributions of 80,000 francs. 

The profits have enabled her to help with family expenses (food, the children's school costs, day-to-day expenses…); bolster her business; and resolve her personal needs.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics to resell

loans.name: Oumy's Group

texts.fr:
Madame Astou est une femme mariée âgée de 32 ans et mère de 2 enfants dont un garçon et une fille.Elle est membre du banc villageois depuis sa création le 28 Mai 2009.son groupe d’appartenance est constitué de femmes unies par de bonnes relations sociales et économiques habitant le même quartier.Elle est debout à l’extrême gauche de la photo la main levée habillée en tenu africaine.Elle fait du commerce de chaussures et de produits cosmétiques depuis de nombreuses années ce qui lui a permis d'avoir une bonne expérience dans le domaine.Avec son nouveau crédit de 60000 elle va acheter des produits cosmétiques des chaussures qu'elle va revendre au détail dans son quartier.
Les bénéfices lui permettent de prendre en charge ses enfants et d'épargner dans le banc villageois.
texts.en:
Astou is a married woman, 32 years old, and mother of two children - one boy and one girl. She has been a member of the "banc villageois" since it was formed on May 28, 2009. The group she belongs to is made up of women tied together by strong social and economic relationships, and who live in the same neighborhood. She is standing on the far left of the photo with her hand raised, and is wearing traditional African clothing. 

Astou has been in the business of selling shoes and cosmetic products for many years, which has enabled her to have good experience in this area. With her new loan proceeds of 60,000 she will purchase cosmetic products and shoes which she will resell on a retail basis in her neighborhood. The profits allow her to support her children and to save with the "banc villageois."

loans.use: to buy cosmetic products and shoes

loans.name: Armando

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais um sobrinho que vive com ele. 	
É militar e tem um negocio próprio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (amendoim, arroz, refrescos, óleo, e outros), para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja ampliar a sua casa para melhor estalar a sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é aumentar o nível do seu negócio e obter mais rendimento.
texts.en: Armando is married and the father of two school-aged children. He lives with his family in a home they own and also supports a nephew, who lives with them. He is a soldier and has a business selling staple goods. He will use this loan to buy products (peanuts, rice, soft drinks, cooking oil, etc.) to increase the quantity of merchandise he carries. In the future he hopes to add on to his house to better accommodate his family. He is committed to paying off this loan so he can apply for further loans from Hluvuku. His greatest challenge is to expand his business and earn greater profits.

loans.use: to buy goods for his shop (peanuts, rice, soft drinks, cooking oil, etc.).

loans.name: Augusto

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 4 filhos todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta a sua irmã que vive com ele. 	
Trabalha como operador de máquinas nos Caminhos de Ferro de Moçambique. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, areia, tinta, portas, e outros), para remodelar as dependências de aluguer. 
No futuro deseja construir mais dependências de aluguer e crescer profissionalmente, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos de investimento e dificuldades financeiras.
texts.en: Augusto is married and the father of four children, all of whom attend school. He lives with his family in a home they own and also supports his sister, who lives with them. He works as a machine operator for the Mozambique railroad. He plans to use this loan to buy construction materials (cement, sand, paint, doors, etc.) to remodel the housing he rents out. In the future he hopes to build more rental housing and grow professionally. He is committed to paying off his loan so that he can request further loans from Hluvuku. The challenge he faces is the lack of investment capital and financial difficulties.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, sand, paint, doors, etc.).

loans.name: Ndeye Awa's Group

texts.fr:
Madame Awa est une femme mariée âgée de 51 ans et mère de 3 enfants dont 2 garçons et une fille.Elle est membre du banc villageois depuis le 01 Décembre 2008.Son groupe est composé de femme qui habitent le même quartier et entretiennent de bonnes relations sociales.Elle est debout à l’extrême gauche de la photo la main levée habillée en tissu fleurette.Awa fait du commerce de produits divers et la transformation de produits depuis plusieurs années ce qui lui à permis d'avoir une expérience dans le domaine.Avec son nouveau crédit de 60000 elle va acheter des fruits du bissap pour transformation en jus et des tissus.
Les bénéfices lui permettent de renforcer son fonds de commerce et de prendre en charge les frais de scolarité et la nourriture de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Ms. Awa is a married woman, 51 years old, and the mother of three children, 2 boys and 1 girl. She has been a member of the 'banc villageois' since December 1, 2008. Her group is composed of women living in the same district who maintain good social relationships. In the photo, she is standing at the far left with her hand raised and in flowery dress. 

Ms. Awa has been doing commerce in diverse products and processing goods for several years allowing for experience in this domain. 

With her new loan of 60,000 francs, she is going to purchase cloth; and fruit and some hibiscus flowers in order to process into juices.

The profits enable her to bolster her business fund and to pay for her children's schooling and food.

loans.use: to purchase cloth to sell and some fruit & vegetables to make juices

loans.name: Fatou's Group

texts.fr:
Madame Arame est une femme veuve âgée de 55 ans et mère de sept enfants dont 2 filles et 5 garçons.
Elle est membre du banc villageois depuis 01/02/2000. Son groupe est composé de femmes qui habitent le même village s'activant toutes dans le commerce.
Elle est debout  à l’extrême droite de la photo la main levée habillée en blanc. Arame fait du petit commerce par la vente de produits divers.
 Son nouveau crédit de 200000 francs lui permettra de se procurer de l’arachide de l'huile et des épices qu'elle va revendre au détail au niveau de son quartier. Les bénéfices lui permettent d'épargner au niveau du banc villageois de prendre en charges les dépenses et les besoins sanitaires de sa famille.
texts.en:
Ms. Arame is a widow, 55 years old, and the mother of seven children, 2 girls and 5 boys. She has been a member of the 'banc villageois' since February 1, 2000. Her group is composed of women living in the same village who are all active in commerce. In the photo, she is standing at the far right with her hand raised and dressed in white. 

Ms. Arame works in small-scale commerce selling a variety of goods. Her new loan of 200,000 francs will enable her to acquire peanut oil and some spices that she is going to sell retail in her district. The profits enable her to save money at the 'banc villageois', cover expenses, and meet her family's health care needs.

loans.use: to purchase peanut oil and some spices to sell

loans.name: Khady's Group

texts.fr:
Madame Khady est une femme mariée âgée de 52 ans et mère de 5 enfants et 2 neveux.Elle est membre du banc villageois depuis  sa création en 2002.Elle entretienne de bonnes relations sociales et économiques avec ses camarades .Elle est debout à droite de la photo la main levée et habillée en tissu fleurette beige marron.Khady s'active dans le commerce de tissus et prêt a porter.Avec son nouveau crédit de 400000 francs CFA elle va acheter des tissus qu'elle va coudre et revendre au détail au niveau de son village.
